A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All of the negative reviews previously posted are spot on.  While the GFX group does their thing\, the writing and directorial end did not.  This mess was a Lone Starr appearance away from a Spaceballs sequel.  the TONE is all wrong and the jokes are just cringe worthy.  It's ghostbusters-esque in execution and like the ghostbusters reboot\, spits in the faces of those of us who kept this franchise going.  It's a sad state of affairs in SW land.
